name: XRY Data File
summary: Learn about .XRY files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: XRY files are created using a XRY communication unit, which can retrieve data via a USB, Bluetooth, or infrared connection. They can be viewed on a computer using the free XRY Reader application.
The XRY communication unit and related software are technically referred to as the ".XRY System."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
